Raul Castro Ruz Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Havana
articles.content:
Raul Castro Ruz Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Havana 
    Havana, October 8 (KCNA) -- Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and minister of Revolutionary Armed Forces, on Oct.7 sent a floral basket to the Korean embassy here on the occasion of the 60th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.

Message of Sympathy to President of Afghanistan
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to President of Afghanistan 
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of sympathy to Afghan President Hamid Karzai as regards the strong earthquake that hit the border area of Afghanistan, claiming big human casualties and material losses.
 The message expressed the belief that the Afghan president and government would eradicate the aftereffect of the disaster and bring the living of the inhabitants in the afflicted area to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: Military Attaches in China Visit Different Places of DPRK
articles.content:
Military Attaches in China Visit Different Places of DPRK 
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Military attaches of the embassies of different countries in Beijing visited Mangyongdae on Oct. 9.
 At the old home in Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, they looked round historical relics with keen interest, being briefed on the revolutionary history and the revolutionary family of the President, who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country, the happiness of the people and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
 They had a photograph taken in commemoration of their visit to the old home in Mangyongdae.    
 They also visited the Monument to Party Founding, the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition celebrating the 60th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and other places on the same day.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Indian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Indian President 
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of sympathy to Indian President A. P. J. Abdul Kalam in connection with the big human casualties and material losses caused by a recent earthquake in the northern region of India.
 The message expressed profound sympathy and condolences to the president, government and people of India, and evinced the belief that the Indian government would remove the aftermath of the natural disasters and stabilize the living of residents in the afflicted area at an early date.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Pakistani President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Pakistani President 
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of sympathy to Pakistani President Pervez Musharraf in connection with the big human casualties and material losses caused by a strong earthquake in Kashmir of Pakistan.
 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the president, government and afflicted people of Pakistan and the conviction that the president and government of Pakistan would remove the aftermath of the disasters at an early date and stabilize the living of the people in the afflicted area.

Military Attaches Corps Visit Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visit Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Military attaches corps here on Oct. 9 visited the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition that opened in celebration of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The visitors were deeply impressed to see immortal flowers Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias in full bloom thanks to the Koreans' and world progressive people's strong wishes to convey to posterity the great feats performed by the peerlessly great persons in carrying out the human cause of independence.
 At the end of the visit they made entries in the visitor's book. 
 Vietnamese military attache Nguyen Van Chau wrote:    
 The profound reverence and deep respect of the Korean people and KPA servicepersons for their leaders are fully reflected by this exhibition.
 This flower festival can be held only in the DPRK as it is advancing under the uplifted banner of socialism, inspired by leader Kim Jong Il's Songun guidance.    
 The immortal flowers bearing the august names of the peerlessly great men recognized by the world are cherished deep in the hearts of the world people, he added.

Military Attaches' Corps Here Visit Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Military Attaches' Corps Here Visit Statue of Kim Il Sung
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The military attaches' corps here Sunday visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill to pay homage to him on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
 They laid bouquets before his statue and paid homage to the President with the boundless respect for him who performed immortal exploits for the foundation of the WPK, a revolutionary party of Juche type, and its development and devoted his all for the prosperity of socialist Korea and happiness of the people and the realization of the human cause of independence.

Parade Held in Celebration of Party Anniversary
articles.content:
Parade Held in Celebration of Party Anniversary
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A parade of units of three services of the Korean People's Army, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards took place at Kim Il Sung Square here Monday to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA, appeared in the platform.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Meets Presidential Envoy of Russia
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Presidential Envoy of Russia
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju met and had a friendly talk with Konstantin Borisovich Pulikovski, presidential envoy to the Far East Region of the Russian Federation, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
 On hand were Kim Kwang Rin, chairman of the State Planning Commission, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and Andrei Gennadiyevich Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of Congolese Party of Labor Arrives Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Congolese Party of Labor Arrives Here
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Congolese Party of Labor led by Mbeh Hubert, member of its Central Committee, arrived here today to participate in  celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 It was greeted at the airport by officials concerned.

articles.title: Chinese Youth Delegation and Family of Zhang Weihua Here
articles.content:
Chinese Youth Delegation and Family of Zhang Weihua Here
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A Beijing municipal youth delegation led by Wang Minghao, first deputy secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Youth League of China, arrived here Sunday to participate in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 A family of Zhang Weihua who is related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle also arrived here on the same day.
